summary:
**Summary of ASX Announcement (Solis Minerals Ltd – SLM):**  

- **TSX-V Delisting Completed** – Shares delisted from TSX-V on 23 June 2025; strategic focus now on ASX listing.  
- **ASX Waivers Revised** – Revocations of waivers from Listing Rules 2.4, 2.8, 10.18, and 15.7. Variations to Rules 4.2A/4.2B (half-year reporting aligned with Canadian requirements) and 4.10.9 (beneficial ownership disclosure).  
- **Financial Year-End Change** – Intends to adopt 31 December 2025 year-end post-Australian registration (confirmation pending).  

No material trading or capital markets impact identified beyond delisting/authomality reporting changes.  

*(Omitted: CEO commentary, operational background, forward-looking statements.)*
